data.meanings: to be watchful, spend the night awake, flash by night. sahiratun - surface of the earth, open (e.g. eye, space), awakened, wide land having no growth.
data.sentence: The word بِالسَّاهِرَةِ comes from the root س ه ر and is associated with the meanings: to be watchful, spend the night awake, flash by night. sahiratun - surface of the earth, open (e.g. eye, space), awakened, wide land having no growth.
